c74object.name: sp.sequenceclock~
c74object.digest: Rhythm sequencer with skip, rest, and range parameters
c74object.description: Rhythm sequencer with skip, rest, and range parameters.
c74object.discussion: Open the Overview Patch The sp.sequenceclock~ object lets you store a list of rhythms and play them back in a variety of ways with rest, skip, and range masking.

outlet.description: Dump output for skip and rest probabilities.

objarg.name: default
objarg.digest: JSON file to load by default
objarg.description: JSON file to load by default.

method.name: clear
method.digest: Clears all sequence and probability data
method.description: Clears all sequence and probability data.

method.name: dump
method.digest: Dumps rest and skip probability lists out the dump outlet
method.description: Dumps rest and skip probability lists out the dump outlet for displaying loaded sequences.

method.name: jump
method.digest: Jump to this position in the ramp immediately
method.description: Jump to this position in the ramp immediately

method.name: load
method.digest: Opens file dialog to select saved sequence file
method.description: Opens file dialog to select saved sequence file.

method.name: print
method.digest: Prints summary info to the Max console
method.description: Prints summary info to the Max console.

method.name: read
method.description: Reads a pre-created sequence file directly from a relative or absolute path.

method.name: record
method.digest: Enable recording of rhythmic pattern to use as a sequence
method.description: Enable recording of rhythmic pattern to use as a sequence.

method.name: reset
method.digest: Resets the position of the internal counter to zero
method.description: Resets the position of the internal counter to zero.

method.name: write
method.digest: Write a file with all the sequence and probability data to disk
method.description: Write a file with all the sequence and probability data to disk.

attribute.name: direction
attribute.description: Direction of step direction (forward, reverse, random)

attribute.name: restprob
attribute.digest: List of probabilities of remaining silent for a step
attribute.description: List of probabilities of remaining silent for a step. List length should be equal to your sequence length.

attribute.name: sequence
attribute.digest: The contents of the clock sequence
attribute.description: The contents of the clock sequence where each value represents a delay in ms before the next clock pulse.

attribute.name: skipprob
attribute.digest: List of probabilities for skipping a step entirely
attribute.description: List of probabilities for skipping a step entirely. List length should be equal to your sequence length.

attribute.name: weight
attribute.digest: Weight of the difference in rhythm being applied
attribute.description: Weight of the difference in rhythm being applied (in %).
